title: 2.32 Hark! The Herald Angels Sing. 2018 Christmas Special
itunes:title: Hark! The Herald Angels Sing. 2018 Christmas Special
description: My Christmas special tells the story of Christmas as related by the gospel of Luke. With lots of canticles and shepherds. My forthcoming Epiphany special relates the gospel of Matthew's version of the nativity.
content:encoded: My Christmas special tells the story of Christmas as related by the gospel of Luke. With lots of canticles and shepherds. My forthcoming Epiphany special relates the gospel of Matthew's version of the nativity.
itunes:subtitle: The story of Christmas, as told in the gospel of Luke.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
